column2: was I wrong. All I had to do was tell the waiter that I was vegetarian
column3: and he immediately brought me a delicious veggie and avocado roll. I was pretty satisfied given that usually the "vegetarian option" at many restaurants is a boring plate of pasta or steamed vegetables
column4: but it didn't end there. He continued to bring plate after plate of thoughtfully curated Japanese dishes
column5: all of which were beautifully plated and flavorful.
